resources.string:
• Smartphone sensors\' values can be obtained by any app without permissions in Android which is a threat to privacy.
  • This is a vulnerability which can be exploited by a side-channel attack.
  • Our Final Year Project aims at establishing a proof-of-concept that an information being typed by a user in a smartphone can be illegitimately inferred from the smartphone motion produced while typing.
  • Kindly help us by providing sample data. We collect Key presses, Accelerometer and Gyroscope readings while you type in this app. By clicking next, you agree to let us collect Key presses, Accelerometer and Gyroscope readings (Only while you type in this app).

• Turn ON your Mobile Data or WiFi
  • Hold your phone in your left hand and tap the keys using your right hand\'s index finger.
  • Prefer an erect sitting posture and remain seated throughout the course of typing. Avoid sudden movements.
  • Type the sentence as shown on screen including period.
  • The characters you type are not shown on the screen, just keep typing. In case of typo, No worries, continue typing from the next character without using backspace. (Make sure you press the period key at end of each sentence).
  • You can even type the sentence at a slow pace inorder to correctly type the given sentence
  • You will be typing a total of 3 sentences, in which the first and second will be the same.
  • After typing the 3 sentences, click Stop logging which will initiate the upload of the files.
  • Thanks in advance
